New Records: Cleveland Cavaliers extended their winning streak to 10 games, matching a franchise record with all victories by double digits
Key Match Events: Cleveland began a strong second-quarter run, building a 53-29 lead
Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland had a 31-4 record, among the best in NBA history
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland has not lost since Dec. 8, with one home defeat on Nov. 27
Miscellaneous Highlights: Isaac Okoro returned from injury, and the game was part of a larger NBA news context
